prob140.Table.sd¶

Table.sd()¶

Finds standard deviation of Distribution

Returns:

float

Standard Deviation

Examples

>>> dist = Table().values([1, 2, 4]).probability([0.5, 0.4, 0.1])
>>> dist.sd()
0.9
